U

unit - Variable in class model.Tile
The unit on this tile, if any
Unit - Class in units
Base class for all units in the game.
Unit(int, int, Nation, double, double, int, int, Image) - Constructor for class units.Unit
Constructor for a unit Should only be called by subclasses.
unitImages - Variable in class view.RPGView
The unit sprite for each index position
units - package units
 
units - Variable in class model.Nation
A list of the units the nation commands
update(Observable, Object) - Method in class view.RPGView
This method is called when the game model is updated Calls a constructor method to rebuild the tile map to reflect the new game state
updateView() - Method in class controller.RPGController
Asks the model to update the view
updateView() - Method in class model.Model
Updates any observers that the map has changed.
